name: oddpum
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47 "Stuck in a loop" in 3 days.

Yalda is stuck in a 60 seconds time loop and must work with her past clones in order to collect 8 shards of the broken immortality gem.

Submission page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/oddpum

Twitter: https://twitter.com/dietzribi
